statements: SELECT client_name, investment_amount FROM client_information
SELECT * FROM client_information WHERE investment_amount > 10000
SELECT client_name, investment_amount, account_balance FROM client_information WHERE account_balance < 5000
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM client_information ORDER BY client_name DESC
SELECT * FROM client_information WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT client_id, client_name, investment_amount FROM client_information WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT client_name, account_balance FROM client_information WHERE account_balance < 10000 ORDER BY account_balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM client_information WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-05-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, transaction_date FROM client_information WHERE client_name LIKE '%John%' AND investment_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT client_name, investment_amount, account_balance FROM client_information WHERE investment_amount < account_balance ORDER BY investment_amount DESC, account_balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, email, address FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT client_name, transaction_date, amount FROM clients JOIN transactions ON clients.client_id = transactions.client_id;
SELECT client_name, email, address FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, clients.client_name FROM transactions JOIN clients ON transactions.client_id = clients.client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT client_name, address FROM clients WHERE client_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, email_address FROM Clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_name, phone_number FROM Clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT client_name, transaction_amount FROM Clients INNER JOIN Transactions ON Clients.client_id = Transactions.client_id;
SELECT * FROM Clients WHERE client_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT client_id, client_name, email_address FROM Clients WHERE client_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT client_name, phone_number, email_address FROM Clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY client_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY investment_id ASC;
SELECT client_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 0;
SELECT client_id, balance FROM account_balances WHERE balance BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM investments ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT full_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM clients JOIN transactions ON clients.client_id = transactions.client_id WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT client_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_balance > 10000;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients ORDER BY client_name ASC;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' AND investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT client_name, balance_amount AS current_balance FROM clients JOIN account_balances ON clients.client_id = account_balances.client_id;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;

SELECT accounts.account_id, clients.client_name, account_balances.balance_amount FROM accounts JOIN clients ON accounts.client_id = clients.client_id JOIN account_balances ON accounts.client_id = account_balances.client_id WHERE account_balances.balance_type = 'Savings';
